properties.query:
// Author: Rob Russell, Mike Gibbs
// Description:
// Looks for Snake implant related behavior based on cisa advisory aa23-129a
// https://www.cisa.gov/news-events/cybersecurity-advisories/aa23-129a
// https://blogs.vmware.com/security/2017/08/threat-analysis-carbon-black-threat-research-dissects-png-dropper.html
// https://gist.github.com/tjnary/4272b17ef6debcba9e85fd8159be4591
// False Positives: no known false positives
let InstallerNames = dynamic(["jpsetup.exe", "jpinst.exe"]);
let signInLookup = (
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(1d) 
| where DeviceDetail contains "displayName"
| extend DeviceDetailJson = parse_json(DeviceDetail)
| extend DeviceNameSI = tostring(DeviceDetailJson.displayName)
| distinct DeviceNameSI, UserPrincipalName, UserDisplayName
);
(union isfuzzy=True
    (
    DeviceFileEvents
    | where (ActionType == "FileCreated" and 
            FileName == "comadmin.dat" and 
            FolderPath contains @"\system32\Com")
            | extend SILogDeviceName = toupper((split(DeviceName, "."))[0])
            | join kind=leftouter signInLookup on $left.SILogDeviceName == $right.DeviceNameSI
    | project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, UserPrincipalName, RequestAccountName, FolderPath, Tactic = "Snake Kernel Driver and Custom Loader"
    ),(
    DeviceRegistryEvents
    | where ActionType in ("RegistryKeyCreated", "RegistryValueSet")
    | where RegistryKey endswith @"\Classes\.wav\OpenWithProgIds"
    | extend SILogDeviceName = toupper((split(DeviceName, "."))[0])
    | join kind=leftouter signInLookup on $left.SILogDeviceName == $right.DeviceNameSI
    | project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, UserPrincipalName, InitiatingProcessAccountName, ActionType, RegistryKey, Tactic = "Snake Malware via OpenWithProgIds Registry Creation"
    ),(
    DeviceRegistryEvents
    | where ActionType in ("RegistryKeyCreated", "RegistryValueSet")
    | where RegistryKey endswith  @"SECURITY\Policy\Secrets\n"
    | extend SILogDeviceName = toupper((split(DeviceName, "."))[0])
    | join kind=leftouter signInLookup on $left.SILogDeviceName == $right.DeviceNameSI
    | project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, UserPrincipalName, InitiatingProcessAccountName, ActionType, RegistryKey, Tactic = "Snake Malware via Covert Store Registry Key"
    ),(
    union isfuzzy=true
        (
        union withsource=TableName Device*
        | where FileName has_any (InstallerNames) or 
                PreviousFileName has_any (InstallerNames) or
                InitiatingProcessFileName has_any (InstallerNames) or
                InitiatingProcessParentFileName has_any (InstallerNames)
        | extend SILogDeviceName = toupper((split(DeviceName, "."))[0])
        | join kind=leftouter signInLookup on $left.SILogDeviceName == $right.DeviceNameSI
        )
    | project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, UserPrincipalName, AccountName, FileName, PreviousFileName, InitiatingProcessFileName, InitiatingProcessParentFileName, Tactic = "Possible Turla Snake Malware Installer"
    ),(
    union isfuzzy=true
        (
        union withsource=TableName Device*
        | where (FolderPath contains @"\Windows\Registration\" and FolderPath endswith @".crmlog") or
                (InitiatingProcessFolderPath contains @"\Windows\Registration\" and InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith @".crmlog")
        | extend SILogDeviceName = toupper((split(DeviceName, "."))[0])
        | join kind=leftouter signInLookup on $left.SILogDeviceName == $right.DeviceNameSI
        )
    | project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, UserPrincipalName, AccountName, FolderPath, InitiatingProcessFolderPath, Tactic = "Snake Malware via Queue File Creation"
    ),(
    DeviceEvents
    | where ActionType == "ServiceInstalled"
    | extend ServiceName = AdditionalFields.ServiceName
    | where ServiceName contains "WerFaultSvc"
    | extend SILogDeviceName = toupper((split(DeviceName, "."))[0])
    | join kind=leftouter signInLookup on $left.SILogDeviceName == $right.DeviceNameSI
    | project TimeGenerated, DeviceName, UserPrincipalName, AccountName, ServiceName, ServiceDetails = tostring(AdditionalFields), FileName, MD5, Tactic = "Snake Malware via WerFaultSvc Service Creation"
    )
)
properties.description:
Looks for Snake implant related behavior based on cisa advisory aa23-129a                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               
https://www.cisa.gov/news-events/cybersecurity-advisories/aa23-129a
 https://blogs.vmware.com/security/2017/08/threat-analysis-carbon-black-threat-research-dissects-png-dropper.html
 https://gist.github.com/tjnary/4272b17ef6debcba9e85fd8159be4591
PLATFORM:Windows
MITRE:TA0002;T1012,TA0005;T1027;T1027.002;T1112;T1543;T1547,TA0011;T1573;T1573.001;T1573;T1573.002
